name: Board Members
headline: Our Supervisory Board are the driving force behind Louis Dreyfus Company. They oversee and advise Management in performing its tasks and setting the direction of the Group’s business, including Group strategy. They address risk and compliance matters inherent to the business, as well as approve all financial statements.

member.name: Margarita Louis-Dreyfus
member.role: Chairperson of the Supervisory Board, Louis Dreyfus Holding B.V.
member.copy: Non-Executive Chairperson of the Supervisory Board, Louis Dreyfus Company Holdings B.V.
